attributes.action: recind the mandate given to the BBC to charge for a Licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the revelations regarding the criminal deceptions carried out by the BBC against the British Public, and the ever increasing extravagent expenses claimed by its employees(of Public Record), the company should have it's Licence revoked and become a commercial company to fight for revenue with the other channels.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
